rules_text:
Double strike
When you salvage this card onto a permanent you control, put a double strike counter on that permanent.
Salvage {3}{W}{W} [i]({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature or Vehicle. Salvage only as a sorcery.)[/i]
